dev.lyze.gdxUnBox2d

Class Box2DDebugShapeDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.lyze.gdxUnBox2d.Box2DDebugShapeDrawer

  • public class Box2DDebugShapeDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    An alternative to Box2DDebugRenderer that implements ShapeDrawer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Box2DDebugShapeDrawer

        public Box2DDebugShapeDrawer(space.earlygrey.shapedrawer.ShapeDrawer shapeDrawer)

      • Box2DDebugShapeDrawer

        public Box2DDebugShapeDrawer(space.earlygrey.shapedrawer.ShapeDrawer shapeDrawer,
                             boolean drawBodies,
                             boolean drawJoints,
                             boolean drawAABBs,
                             boolean drawInactiveBodies,
                             boolean drawVelocities,
                             boolean drawContacts)
        Ensure that the ShapeDrawer passed to this class has an appropriate defaultLineWidth and pixelSize to match your viewport settings. The width of the circle used to display contacts is 2 * defaultLineWidth.
        Parameters:
        shapeDrawer -
        drawBodies -
        drawJoints -
        drawAABBs -
        drawInactiveBodies -
        drawVelocities -
        drawContacts -
        See Also:
        ShapeDrawer
